title: Justin
description: A New York Times Bestselling AuthorThey were hard and strong . . . and the sweetest, most handsome men of Texas. Diana Palmer presents these legendary cowboys that will captivate your heart.Justin was a rancher who was haunted by the past and had dreamed a thousand times that Shelby was asking for his help . . . but when she finally needed him . . . would he be able to come to her rescue?Republished in 2008 in Long Tall Texan Legacy
author: Diana Palmer
